name: Lil AJ's Big Football
description:
Lil AJ's Big Football is a fun filled 2-minute drill!

1) Play with your USB controller; 

2) or use your mouse to click on the passing icon and use the arrow keys to move the player (only after they catch the ball). 

- There are no incomplete passes; keep throwing until someone catches it.

- The clock only stops for touchdowns and defensive hits.

- Earn 7-points for touchdowns.

- 1-point for destroying a defender with the Bubble Shield.

- Set new high scores with each game!
